* Iron Raptor watched Prowl just as intently as she watched and listened to 
Iris, wondering if he would really give up half his spark for her. But she 
knew him, and even before she heard his reply she knew that he would do it.
She raised her head from her front limbs and stoof on all fours as she heard 
Prowl replyintent in hearing what Iris' answer was going to be.

Iris would have nodded in understanding at Prowls answer...if she would have 
had a head to begin with. But she simply just got down to business.*

IRIS: " Prowl...it's very simple but very dangerouse. It has been tried a 
first time and in the end both sparks died, evaporated. You're taking a 
great risk, but I admire your courage."

* Iron Raptor stepped forward.*

" That's what he's known for..."

* And with that she gave Prowl a little glance but then glued her eyes to 
the star in the cracked screen again, wanting to hear just what he had to 
do.
But it always seemed that Prowl was always the one who saved her in the 
end...he wouldn't let her down now.*

IRIS: " Well, known for it or not, at least you know the prices now.
Anyway, all you have to do Prowl is merge your spark with hers, stablizing 
her corrupted spark and thus calming her beats modes.
There might be some side effects but nothing too seriouse I don't think...*
